content: Would you elaborate on what you mean by “speculative exuberance”?

It is complicated also by people using their NOW account as a savings vehicle--that is, by adding savings to their transactions balances This would again lead us to way overshooting our M1 targets   Well, I don't think we ought to conclude at the outset that they can't
[The midpoint] was 5-1/2 percent, wasn't it?  SPEAKER(?) 6 percent   The range was 4 to 8 percent, that's right
Has anyone talked to the Treasury in that forward-looking sense?
Yes, I think it would be desirable to do that
